summary: A processor class that loads, parses, and prepares the CoLA (Corpus of Linguistic Acceptability) dataset from the GLUE benchmark, offering train and development examples, label handling, and optional T5 prompt generation.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to seamlessly integrate the CoLA dataset into NLP pipelines for model training, evaluation, and prompt-based fineâ€‘tuning, streamlining data preparation and label conversion.
